name: Car Pack (v0.0.9)
description:
Just a game of racing cars in an open world, where you can do anything you want!

Controls:

wasd – car control

Arrow keys – cam control

+ and - – gear control

L – lights

Esc – pause menu

B - jump to 0.1x slow motion

K - change cars

H - Enter the click-to-change-car mode

v0.0.9 changelog:

+ Added a new map.

- Removed a car for testing purposes (Will be re-added in the upcoming update)
